text: Placopecten is a genus of scallops, marine bivalve molluscs in the family Pectinidae, the scallops.Abbott, R.T. & Morris, P.A. A Field Guide to Shells: Atlantic and Gulf Coasts and the West Indies. New York: Houghton Mifflin, 1995. 28. ==Species== Species within the genus Placopecten include: * Placopecten magellanicus (Gmelin, 1791) -- Atlantic deep-sea scallop ==References== Category:Pectinidae Category:Bivalve genera
title: Placopecten
